comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Presumably en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erich_Emminger "Erich Emminger (25 June 1880 – 30 August 1951) was a German politician. He was member of the Center Party from 1913-1918 and the Bavarian People's Party (BVP) 1920-1933. He served as Minister of Justice in the Weimar Republic from 23 November 1923 to 15 April 1924 under Chancellor Wilhelm Marx."
